name: APN Settings
description: APN Settings App include almost all carrier/operator apn setting around the world  All apn are comptible with 2G , 3G and 4G phone with almost all oprator , also every APN is inclue settins like carrier-name, apn-name , mcc-code ,mnc-code, type like internet, mms, wap etc   Some key featear of apps are   - Can search APN by country wise - Can search APN by oparator wise - Can search APN by carrier wise - If some APN are not exists then you can create your own custom APN - You can add APN in your favriout list so you can find out them easily - You can also share selected APN with your friends so they can get setting easliy withoyt insallting app - Almost 1200+ apn settings from word-wide various carrier provider  If you not found your APN in list then you can drop us mail we will add this APN for you  If you have any query/question suggestion then you can send mail to spipl001@gmail.com
